name: Tsheets
overview:
Every 1.3 seconds, somewhere in the world, an employee tracks time with TSheets. Thousands of companies in 28 countries trust TSheets online timesheet technology and reporting technology.

TSheets is the magic ingredient to making it all work; employees fall in love with how easy time tracking is. Employees can track time anywhere, any way they want—using a computer, mobile phone, tablet, GPS-enabled app, text, dial in number and so much more—with clock in / out punch card or manual timesheet flexibility.

All this adds up for everyone, from HR and IT decision-makers to employees clocking in and out every day. TSheets is the #1 employee rated and requested time tracking system on the planet. This core passion makes a real difference for bottom line productivity and accountability across the board. With TSheets, owners and managers can keep track of everything—employees, locations, notes, job codes, even paid time off, vacation and holiday hours—in real time.

Then, they can report it all with data driven precision, running payroll, billing and invoices against time tracked, making calculated accuracy a way of doing business. If desired, administrators can also often instantly sync timesheet data with their existing bookkeeping software, even integrating with QuickBooks in just one click.

Founded in 2006 as the innovative brainchild of CEO Matt Rissell and chief programmer Brandon Zehm, TSheets headquarters is in Eagle, Idaho, but TSheets’ time tracking technology lives in “the cloud,” where data stays secure and accessible no matter where your company goes, no matter what you need to do.

At the end of the line, TSheets’ unparalleled customer service and support team serve to make the TSheets experience truly exceptional. We combine high-tech expertise with friendly real-world insight, so you can learn and understand how to make the best use of our technology by talking to an actual person, joining a weekly webinar, watching a how-to video, or finding a wealth of help online at www.TSheets.com.

milestones.description: Launched TSheets Time Tracking App for Employees in the Intuit App Center
milestones.source_description: New TSheets Time Tracker App Launches for QuickBooks
